title: AUC Honors Mohammad Al Gergawi, UAE Minister Of Cabinet Affairs With the Global Fellow Award | The American University in Cairo

quotes: Al Gergawi founded the Dubai Holding and served as its Chairman until 2017, playing a pivotal role in the establishment of several specialized cities.

In 2018, Al Gergawi was chosen to be a member of the UN Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation, aiming to lay the foundations for enabling governments address the challenges of the rapid technological advancements.

organizations.name: Mohammed bin Rashid Global Initiatives
quotes: Mohammed bin Rashid Global Initiatives, Chairman of the Museum of the Future, and Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Great Arab Minds.

organizations.name: Museum of the Future
quotes: Mohammed bin Rashid Global Initiatives, Chairman of the Museum of the Future, and Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Great Arab Minds.

organizations.name: Great Arab Minds
quotes: Mohammed bin Rashid Global Initiatives, Chairman of the Museum of the Future, and Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Great Arab Minds.

organizations.name: World Economic Forum’s Global Leadership Council
quotes: His Excellency Mohammad Al Gergawi holds several prestigious memberships, including the membership of the World Economic Forum’s Global Leadership Council, entrusted with overseeing the forum’s strategic direction and its platforms.

organizations.name: Global Future Councils
quotes: Furthermore, he serves as Co-Chair of the Global Future Councils, a visionary initiative jointly organized by the Government of the UAE and the World Economic Forum.

organizations.name: UN Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation
quotes: In 2018, Al Gergawi was chosen to be a member of the UN Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation, aiming to lay the foundations for enabling governments address the challenges of the rapid technological advancements.

organizations.name: Dubai Holding
quotes: Al Gergawi founded the Dubai Holding and served as its Chairman until 2017, playing a pivotal role in the establishment of several specialized cities.

organizations.name: Dubai International Financial Centre
quotes: These include the Dubai International Financial Centre, Dubai Internet City, Dubai Media City, Dubai Production City, Dubai Studio City, Dubai Healthcare City, Dubai Humanitarian City, Dubai Design District, Dubai Academic City, Dubai Industrial City, Dubai Knowledge Park, Dubai Outsource City, and Dubai Science Park, among others.

organizations.name: Dubai Investment and Development Authority
quotes: He also held the position of Chairman of the Dubai Investment and Development Authority.

organizations.name: Executive Council of Dubai
quotes: Over the past years, he has held prominent positions in various sectors, including: Secretary General of the Executive Council of Dubai, Chairman of the Emirates Competitiveness Council, Vice Chairman of the Emirates Investment Authority, Founding Chairman of the Young Arab Leaders (YAL), Managing Director of Dubai Media Incorporated (DMI).

organizations.name: Emirates Competitiveness Council
quotes: Over the past years, he has held prominent positions in various sectors, including: Secretary General of the Executive Council of Dubai, Chairman of the Emirates Competitiveness Council, Vice Chairman of the Emirates Investment Authority, Founding Chairman of the Young Arab Leaders (YAL), Managing Director of Dubai Media Incorporated (DMI).

organizations.name: Emirates Investment Authority
quotes: Over the past years, he has held prominent positions in various sectors, including: Secretary General of the Executive Council of Dubai, Chairman of the Emirates Competitiveness Council, Vice Chairman of the Emirates Investment Authority, Founding Chairman of the Young Arab Leaders (YAL), Managing Director of Dubai Media Incorporated (DMI).

organizations.name: Young Arab Leaders (YAL)
quotes: Over the past years, he has held prominent positions in various sectors, including: Secretary General of the Executive Council of Dubai, Chairman of the Emirates Competitiveness Council, Vice Chairman of the Emirates Investment Authority, Founding Chairman of the Young Arab Leaders (YAL), Managing Director of Dubai Media Incorporated (DMI).

organizations.name: Dubai Media Incorporated (DMI)
quotes: Over the past years, he has held prominent positions in various sectors, including: Secretary General of the Executive Council of Dubai, Chairman of the Emirates Competitiveness Council, Vice Chairman of the Emirates Investment Authority, Founding Chairman of the Young Arab Leaders (YAL), Managing Director of Dubai Media Incorporated (DMI).

organizations.name: United Arab Emirates University (UAEU)
quotes: In the academic field, Al Gergawi has served as a member of a number of national and international higher education institutions, including the Board of Directors of the United Arab Emirates University (UAEU); the Board of Trustees of Abu Dhabi University (ADU), and the Supreme Council of the UAE National Defence College (NDC).

organizations.name: Abu Dhabi University (ADU)
quotes: In the academic field, Al Gergawi has served as a member of a number of national and international higher education institutions, including the Board of Directors of the United Arab Emirates University (UAEU); the Board of Trustees of Abu Dhabi University (ADU), and the Supreme Council of the UAE National Defence College (NDC).

organizations.name: UAE National Defence College (NDC)
quotes: In the academic field, Al Gergawi has served as a member of a number of national and international higher education institutions, including the Board of Directors of the United Arab Emirates University (UAEU); the Board of Trustees of Abu Dhabi University (ADU), and the Supreme Council of the UAE National Defence College (NDC).

organizations.name: Mohammed bin Rashid School of Government (MBRSG)
quotes: He was the Founding President of the Mohammed bin Rashid School of Government (MBRSG) and also served as a member of the International Advisory Board of the American University of Beirut (AUB).

organizations.name: American University of Beirut (AUB)
quotes: He was the Founding President of the Mohammed bin Rashid School of Government (MBRSG) and also served as a member of the International Advisory Board of the American University of Beirut (AUB).

organizations.name: Dubai Autism Center (DAC)
quotes: In the social field, Al Gergawi has supervised a number of social initiatives such as establishing the Dubai Autism Center (DAC) and the UAE Disabled Sports Federation.

organizations.name: UAE Disabled Sports Federation
quotes: In the social field, Al Gergawi has supervised a number of social initiatives such as establishing the Dubai Autism Center (DAC) and the UAE Disabled Sports Federation.
